xbrli:xbrl.in-capmkt:DescriptionOfBusinessActivity: Aluminum Casting Metal and Metal products
xbrli:xbrl.in-capmkt:ABriefOnTypesOfCustomersExplan:
Alicon is catering to Automotive and non-automotive segment.
In Auto we are supplying to Segments such as 2W, 3W, PV, CV Fuel type ICE, EV, Hybrid, Fuel Cell, CNG, Market Domestic & Global
In Non-Auto we are supplying Segments such as Defense, Agriculture, Infrastructure, Medical, Energy, Aerospace Market Domestic & Global
xbrli:xbrl.in-capmkt:RationaleForIdentifyingTheRisk: Business interruption due to natural calamities like earthquakes, cyclones, floods, etc. Inadequate disaster recovery planning
xbrli:xbrl.in-capmkt:InCaseOfRiskApproachToAdaptOrM: 1. Adequate protection against calamities including appropriate insurance 2. Introduced additional mitigation to overcome interruptions due to pandemic situations
xbrli:xbrl.in-capmkt:RationaleForIdentifyingTheRisk: Non-compliance with safety measures by employees Non-awareness of hazardous nature of chemicals
xbrli:xbrl.in-capmkt:InCaseOfRiskApproachToAdaptOrM: 1. Strict adherence to BBS (behavior-based safety system) 2. Focus on reducing the generation of effluent and arresting at the source
xbrli:xbrl.in-capmkt:RationaleForIdentifyingTheRisk: The potential carbon routes for reducing GHG emissions offer distinct operational and energy supply opportunities
xbrli:xbrl.in-capmkt:InCaseOfRiskApproachToAdaptOrM: 1. Clean energy integration in existing electric networks 2. Investment of capital in assets that will serve diversied electricity and fuel retrotting on the energy supply system
xbrli:xbrl.in-capmkt:RationaleForIdentifyingTheRisk: Risk of better solutions that meet new requirements, technological advancements, upgradation or existing market needs
xbrli:xbrl.in-capmkt:InCaseOfRiskApproachToAdaptOrM: 1. Structured technology development projects 2. New focus areas are identied to develop future capability needs Focus on light weighting and EV
xbrli:xbrl.in-capmkt:MaterialIssueIdentified: IT data centre & far sight disaster recovery (DR)
xbrli:xbrl.in-capmkt:RationaleForIdentifyingTheRisk: Risk of in adequate data centre & far sight DR
xbrli:xbrl.in-capmkt:InCaseOfRiskApproachToAdaptOrM: 1. The disaster recovery (DR) strategy is being updated continuously 2. Data centre is established and near site DR is available
xbrli:xbrl.in-capmkt:RationaleForIdentifyingTheRisk: Skilled employees and workers form an asset to the Company. The highly trained employees and worker perform their tasks more efficiently, in less time and with less chances of injury
xbrli:xbrl.in-capmkt:InCaseOfRiskApproachToAdaptOrM: 1. Providing a needs-based and innovative range of training courses, notably in forwardthinking elds of expertise like digitalization 2. Attracting and developing the right talent, ensuring professional development and personal well-being throughout their tenure with the Company 3. Providing programmes that are specically designed for roles which require upgraded skills
xbrli:xbrl.in-capmkt:RationaleForIdentifyingTheRisk: Risk of sub-optimal maintenance plan due to manual updating of ODR and MGR reports resulting in un-economical maintenance costs
xbrli:xbrl.in-capmkt:InCaseOfRiskApproachToAdaptOrM: Operational performance (OEE) & maintenance (PM & breakdown) are being monitored through SAP for all the major plants
xbrli:xbrl.in-capmkt:RationaleForIdentifyingTheRisk: Risk of condential data leakage via USB drives/flash drives Exposure of Company data because of work from home and access to respective data
xbrli:xbrl.in-capmkt:InCaseOfRiskApproachToAdaptOrM: 1. All privileged system access are reviewed periodically & data leakage prevention (DLP) system are implemented at these equipment 2. Restricted data access control & data encryption to monitor work from home activities
xbrli:xbrl.in-capmkt:RationaleForIdentifyingTheRisk: Failure to provide a safe working environment exposes Alicon to compensation liabilities, sub- optimal productivity, loss of business reputation and other costs
xbrli:xbrl.in-capmkt:InCaseOfRiskApproachToAdaptOrM: 1. All the necessary pollution control norms for air, noise etc. are followed 2. Disposal of hazardous waste is monitored within permissible limits
xbrli:xbrl.in-capmkt:RationaleForIdentifyingTheRisk: Risk of customer being lost, in course of business Dissatisfaction amongst the customer due to lack of attention, focus, etc.
xbrli:xbrl.in-capmkt:InCaseOfRiskApproachToAdaptOrM: 1. Enhance customer satisfaction 2. Coefficient - alignment in strategies, partner of choice 3. Providing end to end solutions, dual shore business model
xbrli:xbrl.in-capmkt:RationaleForIdentifyingTheRisk: Risk of threat or danger to the name or standing of business or entity Actions involving the Company directly or indirectly may damage the brand name
xbrli:xbrl.in-capmkt:InCaseOfRiskApproachToAdaptOrM: 1. Worldwide brand-building activities are an ongoing process 2. Participation in exhibition and trade fairs 3. Good reputation and relations with major trade companies

xbrli:xbrl.in-capmkt:StatementByDirectorResponsible: FY 2023-24 witnessed a significant scale-up in these strategic growth areas, which enabled us to achieve a more balanced product mix. The share of Passenger Vehicles (PV) and Commercial Vehicles (CV) touched 52% of sales compared to 49% in FY 2022-23.

xbrli:xbrl.in-capmkt:DetailsOfSpecifiedCommitteeOfT: Yes. Alicon Castalloy Limited has set up an ESG Committee, which continuously evaluates the Companys social, environmental, governance, and economic obligations. Further details regarding the ESG Committee are provided in the Corporate Governance section in the Annual Report.

xbrli:xbrl.in-capmkt:AntiCorruptionOrAntiBriberyPol:
Alicon Castalloy Limited has an Anti-Corruption and Anti Bribery Policy which commands strict actions against anyone caught engaging in such unethical behavior.The policy applies to all employees of the Company, its subsidiaries, joint ventures, and affiliates at all levels and in all locations around the world. In every sector of action, all employees are required to act with the utmost honesty.
All of the Company's facilities must adhere to a variety of anti-bribery and anti-corruption laws and regulations. Wherever it operates, the Company maintains the highest standards and does not tolerate bribery or corruption.
The policy can be accessed at: https://www.alicongroup.co.in/corporate-governance/
xbrli:xbrl.in-capmkt:DetailsOfTheEntityHaveProcesse: Alicon Castalloy Limited, has processes in place to avoid/manage conflict of interests involving members of the board and it is as per the Terms of Appointment of Directors to Board. The Company's Code of Conduct states that the Board members and Senior Management of the Company are needed to abstain themselves from discussion, voting, or otherwise influencing a decision on any matter in which they have or may have a conflict of interest; restrict themselves from serving as a Director of any Company that is in direct competition with the Company, or must take prior approval from the Company's Board of Directors before accepting such position.

xbrli:xbrl.in-capmkt:DetailsOfOccupationalHealthAnd: Alicon considers occupational health and safety as prime to its business and places great emphasis on maintaining all the protocols in place to operate business in a sustainable manner. For ensuring 100% workplace safety, the Company has in place a comprehensive Health and Safety management system in place with safety compliant protocols included
xbrli:xbrl.in-capmkt:DesclosureOfTheProcessesUsedTo: Alicon has established system to identify work-related hazards and assess risks on a routine basis which is part of daily work management and also safety system. The company also made this as a part of monthly review and assessment system. The Company identifies all the potential work-related incidents through the hazard identification process and conducts likelihood assessment to estimate the frequency or probability of occurrence. For non-routine company has a system of assessment, site review and work permit to ensure essential controls in place to avoid or minimize risk.
xbrli:xbrl.in-capmkt:DescribeTheMeasuresTakenByTheE:
Alicon has adopted a comprehensive Management Policy encompassing Environment, Occupational Health, and Safety (EHS) to underscore its dedication to safeguarding the well-being of all stakeholders from potential harm or health risks. The company has proactively implemented safety protocols to effectively manage and respond to workplace incidents or accidents. The collective reduction in health and safety incidents can be attributed to the firm dedication of both management and employees in cultivating a secure work environment. This commitment is reinforced by the company's established management approach, accompanied by the adoption of a health and safety-first mindset for fulfilling the responsibilities.
We have been giving safety training, safety awareness programs, Mock drills, periodic safety audit by safety officer and extern safety consultants. We also conduct on job safety education at the same time we also encourage everyone to follow safety during routine life.
xbrli:xbrl.in-capmkt:DetailsOfAnyCorrectiveActionTa: The company has conducted education and training programs for the key value chain partners to improve health and safety as a precautionary step. We periodical review their progress to ensure adherence.
xbrli:xbrl.in-capmkt:NotesPrinciple3ExplanatoryText: Zero or Not Applicable has been entered where the data request was not available to avoid the validation error in the sheet. Data in point no. 1(C) is specifically keyed in from audited financial statement whereever available.
xbrli:xbrl.in-capmkt:DetailsOfMeasuresUndertakenByT: The Company takes great care to ensure that the statutory dues applicable are deducted and deposited by the valuechain partners. The details are outlined in the Bharat Forge Supplier Code of Conduct. All supply chain partners must adhere to it in every way in order to support business responsibility principles and ideals of transparency andaccountability.
xbrli:xbrl.in-capmkt:DetailsOfAnyCorrectiveActionTa: The company has conducted education and training programs for the key value chain partners to improve health and safety as a precautionary step. We periodical review their progress to ensure adherence.
xbrli:xbrl.in-capmkt:DescribeTheProcessesForIdentif: Alicon has systematically recognized and ranked internal and external stakeholders according to their impact on organizational choices and operations.
xbrli:xbrl.in-capmkt:ProvideTheProcessesForConsulta: Alicon Group has established an ESG Committee at Management level. The ESG committee is responsible for keeping the board informed about various developments and seeking inputs from the Directors. Continuous stakeholder engagement, combined with an in- depth assessment by the ESG committee, aids the organisation in aligning its business with ESG, allowing it to better serve its stakeholders.
xbrli:xbrl.in-capmkt:DetailsOfInstancesAsToHowTheIn: Alicon Group has always maintained a regular and proactive engagement with the Company's key stakeholders, allowing it to effectively work on its ESG strategies and be transparent about the outcomes. In response to current regulations and interactions with stakeholders, the Company performs periodic evaluations to update and reissue policies as needed

xbrli:xbrl.in-capmkt:DescribeTheInternalMechanismsI:
Alicon Group recognises the importance of protection of human rights, and the Company is dedicated to upholding the human rights of its employees, communities, contractors, and suppliers in accordance with the International Bil lof Human Rights, the International Labour Organization's (ILO) Declaration on Fundamental Principles and Rights atWork, and the United Nations Global Compact.
The Company has formulated a Human Rights Policy which works in conjunction with the Grievance Policy to ensurethat grievances are addressed promptly and effectively.
The mechanism works by following the instructions outlined below:
The employees/affiliates address their complaints or grievances or report instances to the Human Resource department/Senior Management. No reprisal or retaliatory action is taken against any employee/affiliate for raising concerns under this policy.
The Company periodically undertakes human rights due diligence process for management and oversight/monitoring of the policy and identify any shortcomings
xbrli:xbrl.in-capmkt:MechanismsToPreventAdverseCons: The Company has a Grievance Policy which states that all members of the Grievance Committee and those entrusted to record keeping.
xbrli:xbrl.in-capmkt:DetailsOfTheScopeAndCoverageOf: Human rights due diligence is being covered as part of the other audits presently. Exclusive Human rights due diligence is yet to be conducted. We are planning to take it up in the coming years

xbrli:xbrl.in-capmkt:DetailsOfWasteManagementPracti:
Alicon demonstrates its commitment towards responsible waste management through the recycling of waste products via authorized recycling partners. Moreover, across all pertinent plant sites, Alicon has established advanced Wastewater Treatment Plants (WWTPs), encompassing both Effluent Treatment Plants (ETPs) and Sewage Treatment Plants (STPs).
Furthermore, a central focus of Alicon's approach involves the conscious adoption of streamlined processes, innovative techniques, and advanced technologies that effectively curtail the generation of waste materials. By embracing these strategies, Alicon not only contributes to environmental preservation but also contributes to sustainable practices and circularity via waste reduction and resource optimization.
xbrli:xbrl.in-capmkt:DisclosureWebLinkOfEntityAtWhi:
Alicon's management framework has a comprehensive emergency procedure designed to effectively manage and mitigate emergency situations, thereby reducing risks to both the environment and human well-being. The organization has proactively identified potential emergency scenarios and designated specific roles and responsibilities to ensure efficient handling of such incidents. The commitment to readiness is evident through the regular execution of mock drills and the ongoing evaluation conducted by internal representatives. Additionally, external experts are engaged for audits and on-the-job training, which collectively strengthen the organization's preparedness for swift recovery and immediate response in times of crisis.
Alicon places a significant emphasis on ensuring the continuity of its core operations and supporting functions, including robust systems and IT infrastructure, as part of its continuity management strategy. This approach reinforces the organization's dedication to maintaining operational integrity even during challenging circumstances
xbrli:xbrl.in-capmkt:DiscloseAnySignificantAdverseI: There were no areas/materials in the value chain of the entity which have been identified as having significant adverse impact on the environment

xbrli:xbrl.in-capmkt:DescribeTheMechanismsInPlaceTo:
Alicon is a top-tier B2B enterprise specializing in advanced aluminum casting technology products designed to meet the specific requirements of major OEMs. The company is committed to on-time delivery, ensuring that products are supplied in the exact quantities and within the timelines agreed upon with customers.
Should any issues arise, customers have multiple channels to express their concerns. They can directly communicate with the Key account manager, company's representatives Quality, Operation, Design via email or telephonic media.
We have set SOPs to response and address customer complains with in-depth analysis by CFTs and relevant subject experts. The same also reflects in rating given by customers periodically
xbrli:xbrl.in-capmkt:WeblinkWhereInformationOnProdu: All information can be accessed on the company's website https://www.alicongroup.co.in/what-we-do/
xbrli:xbrl.in-capmkt:StepsTakenToInformAndEducateCo: The company's production is exclusively aligned with customer drawings and specifications, with a primary clientele comprising OEMs. Rigorous validation and extensive testing procedures are carried out to evaluate safety parameters and ensure compliance with regulations.
